A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you enjoyed the original trilogy\, I would suggest that you skip this one. The original characters are basically trashed. The behavior of \"Luke\" is completely out of character. So much so that Mark Hamill had to play it as if it were another role. The movie is very politically correct and indeed this seems to be the primary focus of the film. I've disliked movies before\, but this one made me angry and disgusted.
